name: Tiny Dungeon - IN PROGRESS
description:
Inspired by many RPGs, I want to create a world players can explore  while becoming stronger and overcoming greater challenges. The project is still in an early stage, but I want to hear what you think about it

Controls:

  • Movement - WASD
  • Attack towards mouse position - Left Click
  • Interact - E
  • Health Potion - H
  • Bomb - Q
  • (Debug) Quick restart - ENTER

The game has no audio/sounds, I'll work on those later. Feel free to play some music as you explore the dungeon
